body: This change may have performance implications: `grad_fn()` will update the _grad_fn if output is a view with a stale _grad_fn. I don't think that's what you want for this comparison.
body_html: This change may have performance implications: grad_fn() will update the _grad_fn if output is a view with a stale _grad_fn. I don't think that's what you want for this comparison.
body_text: This change may have performance implications: grad_fn() will update the _grad_fn if output is a view with a stale _grad_fn. I don't think that's what you want for this comparison.
